text: Bwebajja gyoli abo abakkiriza e bigambo bya ffe, gamba nti emirembe gibeere ku mmwe, Mukama omulabirizi wa mmwe yeekakasaako okusaasira, nekiba nti oyo yenna mu mmwe akola ekibi mu butamanya oluvanyuma lwakyo ne yeenenya, era nâ€™akola e mirimu e mirungi, mazima bulijjo Katonda musonyiyi musaasizi
